text: The Eastman School of Music of the University of Rochester (also known more simply as The Eastman School, Eastman, or ESM) is a music conservatory in Rochester, New York, in the United States. It is said to be one of the best schools for teaching music in the world. Category:Music schools Category:Colleges and universities in New York (state) Category:Buildings and structures in New York (state)
title: Eastman School of Music
